name: Tank Tussle
description:
In the brink of a war; two tanks are battling within a maze laced with mines.  They both only have a limited time to claim victory or its game over. 

Controls:

Player 1 (Green): Up Arrow=Up; Down Arrow=Down; Left Arrow=Left; Right Arrow=Right; Slash (/)= Fire

Player 2 (Red): W=Up; S=Down; A=Left; D= Right; F=Fire
